# Util

## getHashFromTransfer

-   **See: [https://docs.binance.org/api-reference/dex-api/ws-streams.html#3-transfer][1]
    **

Get `hash` from transfer event sent by Binance chain

### Parameters

-   `transfer`  

## getTxHashFromMemo

Get `hash` from memo

### Parameters

-   `transfer`
